Name: Fragment of a tile
Description: This fragment of a tile in sandstone comes from the excavations of W. F. Petrie at Serabit el-Khadim in 1904-1905. It was part of a decoration engraved on the facade of a pillar in the speos of Hathor. The scene, which dates from year 5 of the reign of Amenemhat III, represents a chamberlain who performs the duty of fan bearer.
